|desc_5 = Lunges toward the player with their katana, dealing DMG along their path. The windup time before the charge is different depending on the variant used.

* '''Sword Charge:''' Points their blade towards the player and quickly charges towards them, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
|file_5 = Yoriki Samurai Sword Lunge 1
|caption_5 = Iai: Thrust
|file_5_2 = Yoriki Samurai Sword Lunge 2
|caption_5_2 = Sword Charge

|name_6 = Block
|desc_6 = Assumes a defensive stance either by holding the katana up by the hilt or with one hand on the blade, temporarily blocking attacks from the direction they're facing. If attacked enough, the block will break.

|name_7 = Dodge
|desc_7 = Jumps backwards, away from the player.

===Hues of the Violet Garden===
In the [[Hues of the Violet Garden/Clash of Lone Blades|Hues of the Violet Garden]] event, the Yoriki Samurai named [[Yasuhiko Tarou]] will not perform '''Double Slash''' or '''Iai: Thrust''', but gains the following abilities:

{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1 = RES Increase
|desc_1 = Swings their blade to taunt the player and gains a '''80%''' increase in [[Physical RES]]. This state will expire after 10s, or when the player performs a Perfect Parry against their '''Strong Counterattack'''.
|file_1 = Yoriki Samurai Event DEF Increase

|name_2 = Strong Counterattack
|desc_2 = If attacked continuously, performs two slashes, dealing '''40% ATK''' and '''80% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
|file_2 = Yoriki Samurai Event Strong Counterattack
}}

===A Strange and Friendless Road===
In [[Kaedehara Kazuha]]'s [[Story Quest]] [[Acer Palmatum Chapter]] Act 1, [[A Strange and Friendless Road]], a unique variant of the Yoriki Samurai who is later identified as [[Amenoma Yuuya]] is encountered and fought three times. For his first two encounters he is equipped with the [[Prized Isshin Blade (Awakened)]].

====First/Second Encounter====
During the first and second encounters, only the following attacks are used.
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1 = Superdash
|desc_1 = Points his blade towards the player and performs an extremely fast forward lunge, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} along their path.
|file_1 = Yoriki Samurai Quest Superdash

|name_2 = Slash
|desc_2 = Performs a quick upward or downward close-range slash, dealing '''80% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}. This attack is only used during the first encounter.
|file_2 = Yoriki Samurai Quest Slash Up
|caption_2 = Upward
|file_2_2 = Yoriki Samurai Quest Slash Down
|caption_2_2 = Downward

|name_3 = Two Point Slash
|desc_3 = Performs two slashes, dealing '''50% ATK''' and '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}. This attack is only used during the second encounter.
|file_3 = Yoriki Samurai Quest Slash Combo

|name_4 = Kazuha Slash
|desc_4 = Sheathes his blade and [[Vacuum Field|sucks]] in nearby players before performing a sweeping slash, creating an Autumn Whirlwind field infused with {{Electro}} akin to Kaedehara Kazuha's [[Kazuha Slash]]. The field deals '''37.5% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Electro DMG}} once every second 5 times. This attack is only used during the first and second encounter.
|file_4 = Yoriki Samurai Quest Kazuha Slash
}}

====Third Encounter====
During the third encounter:
* The '''Slash''' attack is disabled.
* The following attacks have their DMG scalings modified from the normal variant:
** '''Two Point Slash:''' '''40% ATK''', '''80% ATK'''.
** '''Iai: Thrust:''' '''150% ATK'''.
** '''Double Slash:''' '''60% ATK × 2'''.
** '''Iai: Quickdraw:''' '''85% ATK × 2'''.
* The following unique attacks are gained:
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1 = Leaping Strike Combo
|desc_1 = Leaps high towards the player's location and perform a downwards strike, dealing '''120% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} and follows up with '''Two Point Slash'''.
|file_1 = Yoriki Samurai Quest Leaping Strike Combo

|name_2 = Two Point Slash Combo
|desc_2 = Slowly slashes at the player two times, dealing '''70% ATK × 2''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} and follows up immediately with '''Double Slash''' after the second slash.
|file_2 = Yoriki Samurai Quest Two Point Slash Combo
}}

===Warrior's Spirit===
In the [[Warrior's Spirit]] event, the character [[Hirotatsu]] is fought on Round 2. His moveset are as follows:
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1 = Two Point Slash
|desc_1 = Raises their katana high and performs two slashes, dealing '''40% ATK''' and '''80% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}. This attack is repeated 2/2/8 times in succession in Normal/Hard/Pro difficulties respectively.
|file_1 = Yoriki Samurai Event 2 Two Point Slash

|name_2 = Slash
|desc_2 = Performs a quick upward or downward close-range slash, dealing '''80% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}. This attack is only used in Normal difficulty.
|file_2 = Yoriki Samurai Event 2 Slash Up
|caption_2 = Upward
|file_2_2 = Yoriki Samurai Event 2 Slash Down
|caption_2_2 = Downward

|name_3 = Leaping Strike Combo
|desc_3 = Leaps high towards the player's location and perform a downwards strike, dealing '''120% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} and follows up with 1 '''Two Point Slash'''. This attack is only used in Hard and Pro difficulties.
|file_3 = Yoriki Samurai Event 2 Leaping Strike Combo

|name_4 = Ultimate Technique: Iai: Quickdraw
|desc_4 = Unsheathes their katana to unleash a flurry of slashes, dealing '''85% ATK × 2''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}. [[Parry]]ing this attack will trigger a counterattack.
|file_4 = Yoriki Samurai Event 2 Iai Quickdraw
|file_4_2 = Yoriki Samurai Event 2 Iai Quickdraw 2

}}
